item.title: KKR 的谢尔顿称市场处于 "信贷分配的黄金时代
item.description: KKR & Co.公司敦促观望的投资者不要再纠结于寻找完美的切入点，而应跳入债市，因为今年预示着 "信贷配置的黄金时代"。【原文：KKR & Co. is urging investors sitting on the sidelines to stop obsessing over finding the perfect entry point and jump into the debt market as this year heralds a “golden age for credit allocation.”】

item.title: 埃及正在洽谈租赁新液化天然气终端，进口量正在增加
item.description: 埃及正计划租赁一个天然气进口终端，同时加大海外采购力度，以避免今年夏天出现能源短缺。【原文：Egypt is planning to lease a natural gas import terminal as it steps up overseas purchases in a bid to avoid energy shortages this summer.】

item.title: 世界粮食计划署称苏丹数百万人面临严重饥饿，援助受阻
item.description: 世界粮食计划署（World Food Programme）表示，战争正在使苏丹的饥饿程度达到创纪录的水平，目前有1800万人正在经历 "严重饥饿"，而向该国运送援助物资也面临挑战。【原文：War is driving hunger to record levels in Sudan, with 18 million people now experiencing “acute hunger” amid challenges bringing aid into the country, the World Food Programme said.】

item.title: 创历史新高的黄金出口推动加拿大贸易顺差扩大
item.description: 受运往瑞士和英国的黄金大幅增加的推动，加拿大的商品贸易收支录得自 10 月份以来的最大盈余。【原文：Canada’s merchandise trade balance recorded its largest surplus since October, driven by a strong increase in gold shipments to Switzerland and the UK.】

item.title: CFA 一级通过率升至 44%，高于历史平均水平
item.description: 特许金融分析师一级考试的通过率跃升至 44%，超过了历史平均水平；不过，已经推迟考试的考生的成功率要低得多。【原文：The pass rate for the first level of the chartered financial analyst exam jumped above its historic average to 44% — though test takers who’d already delayed their exam had a much lower success rate.】

item.title: 摩科瑞与交易商一道进军日本现货电力市场
item.description: 摩科瑞能源集团有限公司（Mercuria Energy Group Ltd.）正准备开始在日本的实物电力市场上进行交易，这是全球大宗商品公司中最新一家试图利用该行业日益加剧的波动性的公司。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group Ltd. is preparing to begin trading in Japan’s physical power market, the latest global commodities firm seeking to capitalize on the sector’s rising volatility.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦大亨侯赛因-达伍德出售煤炭能源业务
item.description: 巴基斯坦商业大亨侯赛因-达伍德（Hussain Dawood）的 Engro 能源公司出售了其煤炭开采和发电业务，该业务在过去五年中一直是该国廉价能源的重要来源。【原文：Pakistani business tycoon Hussain Dawood’s Engro Energy sold its coal mining and power generation business that has been a key source of cheap energy in the nation for the past five years.】

item.title: 马克-安德森和杰夫-维尼克支持加密初创公司新古典资本
item.description: 一对高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）和 BlockTower Capital 的校友成立了一家新的数字资产投资公司，专注于衍生品、现实世界资产代币化、娱乐、游戏和社交等领域。【原文：A pair of Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and BlockTower Capital alumni have launched a new digital-asset investment firm focusing on areas including derivatives, tokenization of real-world assets, entertainment, gaming and social.】

item.title: 杰富瑞与日本三井住友将联盟扩展至加拿大
item.description: 日本最大的银行之一三井住友金融集团正在深化与杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc., one of Japan’s largest banks, is deepening an alliance with Jefferies Financial Group Inc., with the two companies announcing plans to work together on corporate and investment banking deals in the Canadian market.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员认为上月降息理由增强
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）最近一次政策会议的报告显示，该行官员上个月看到了足够令人信服的证据，从而得出结论认为，降息的时机已经来临。【原文：European Central Bank officials saw enough convincing evidence last month to conclude that the time for interest-rate cuts has almost arrived, an account of their latest policy meeting showed.】

item.title: 印度央行将外汇套期保值规则实施时间推迟至 5 月 3 日
item.description: 印度央行将其关于交易所交易货币衍生品规则的实施时间推迟了约一个月，此前该措施在市场上引发了恐慌，因为交易员们试图平掉未对冲的头寸。【原文：India’s central bank pushed back the implementation of its rules on exchange-traded currency derivatives by about a month, after the measure triggered panic in the market as traders tried to square off unhedged positions.】

item.title: 大选焦虑令南非美元债券成为新兴市场最差债券
item.description: 南非美元债券的暴跌使其成为今年发展中市场中表现最差的债券，这反映出投资者担心下个月的选举可能会产生一个对市场不友好的联合政府。【原文：A slump in South African dollar bonds has made them the biggest laggards in developing markets this year, reflecting concern among investors that a market-unfriendly coalition government may emerge from next month’s elections.】

item.title: 市场趋紧，石油生产商扭转乾坤
item.description:
在价格达到六个月高点之际，"欧佩克+"成员国没有暗示未来会放松限制。【原文：

OPEC+ members give no hints about a future easing of restrictions as prices reach six-month highs.

】

item.title: 欧元区银行股超买程度为历史之最
item.description: 欧元区银行股的上涨步伐已经加快，成为历史上超买最严重的股票。【原文：The ascent of euro-area banking stocks has gathered pace to such an extent that they have become the most overbought in history.】

item.title: 肯尼亚中央银行希望提高对贷款人的资本要求
item.description: 肯尼亚计划提高本国银行的资本要求，以保护贷款人免受风险，并支持他们进行地区扩张。【原文：Kenya plans to increase capital requirements for the nation’s banks to protect lenders against risks and bolster them for regional expansion.】

item.title: 法国推动欧盟采取措施重新平衡对华贸易
item.description: 法国将游说欧盟采取措施，根据环境标准重新平衡与中国的贸易，因为法国认为中国产品大量涌入欧盟市场对经济构成了威胁。【原文：France will lobby the European Union for measures to re-balance trade with China based on environmental criteria as it sees an economic threat from a glut of Chinese products flooding the bloc’s market.】

item.title: 亚马逊股价接近历史纪录，投资者关注不断膨胀的现金堆
item.description: 多年来，亚马逊公司一直是科技巨头中最吝啬向股东返还资本的公司。现在，它产生了如此多的现金，以至于华尔街的一些人预计会有更丰厚的回报。【原文：For years, Amazon.com Inc. has been the stingiest among tech megacaps to give back capital to shareholders. Now, it’s generating so much cash that some on Wall Street are anticipating more generous returns.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚证券交易所获得两倍于股票发行量的投标
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚证券交易所（Ethiopian Securities Exchange）表示，在这个非洲之角国家的证券交易所筹集资金开始运营之际，它收到的投标是其提供给投资者的股票数量的两倍多。【原文：The Ethiopian Securities Exchange said it received bids for more than twice the shares it offered investors as the Horn of Africa nation’s bourse raises funds to start operations.】

item.title: 新加坡长租公寓试点兴趣寥寥
item.description: 新加坡试图通过一种新型的长期住宿服务公寓来解决高房租问题，但起步缓慢，几乎没有引起开发商的兴趣。【原文：Singapore’s attempt to tackle high rents with a new type of serviced apartment for long-term stays got off to a slow start, after attracting little interest from developers.】

item.title: 农民加薪提升供应前景，可可价格下滑
item.description: 可可连续第三天下跌，原因是看涨势头减弱，而农民获得更高报酬的前景又燃起了西非供应增加的希望。【原文：Cocoa fell for a third day as bullish momentum loses steam and prospects of higher pay for farmers raises hopes of a supply boost in West Africa.】

item.title: 三井物产和乐敦拟斥资 8 亿新元收购中医药公司
item.description: 三井物产株式会社（Mitsui & Co.）和罗拓制药株式会社（Rohto Pharmaceutical Co.）同意收购余仁生国际有限公司（Eu Yan Sang International Ltd.），该交易对这家传统中药公司的估值为 8 亿新元（5.94 亿美元）。【原文：Mitsui & Co. and Rohto Pharmaceutical Co. agreed to buy Eu Yan Sang International Ltd., in a deal valuing the traditional Chinese medicine company at S$800 million ($594 million).】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储主席鲍威尔安抚了一些人的神经，使市场感到放心，尽管美元继续令一些国家感到头痛。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. Fed Chair Powell soothes some nerves and reassures markets, though the dollar continues to cause some international headaches. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 阿波罗的 OQ 化学公司贷款面临风险，因为阿曼发出了无股权的信号
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc. 的阿曼股东决定不向 OQ 化学公司注资后，该公司利用私人贷款为其 10 亿美元债务再融资的交易面临风险。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc.’s deal to refinance OQ Chemicals’ $1 billion debt with a private loan is at risk after its Omani shareholder decided not to inject money in the company.】

item.title: 欧盟提出新建议，2900 亿美元的环境、社会和治理债券市场面临冷遇
item.description: 一个重要的环境、社会和公司治理债券市场可能还不够绿色，不值得被纳入欧盟对该地区可持续资金流动的审查范围。【原文：A key ESG bond market may not be green enough to merit being included in a European Union review of sustainable flows in the region.】

item.title: 移民帮助美国就业增长快于鲍威尔的速度限制
item.description: 由于移民的增加，今年美国就业市场的热度可能会大大超过美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）所认为的长期可持续热度。【原文：The US jobs market probably will be able to run significantly hotter again this year than Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell has reckoned is sustainable in the long run thanks to increased immigration.】

item.title: 德国银行第四季度受损房产贷款激增
item.description: 德国银行第四季度无力偿还商业地产贷款的客户数量激增，因为该行业面临着更高的利率以及因大流行病而加剧的消费行为变化。【原文：German banks saw a jump in customers struggling to pay back commercial property loans in the fourth quarter, as the sector faces higher interest rates and shifts in consumer behavior exacerbated by the pandemic.】

item.title: 美国官员称印度不会停止进口俄罗斯石油
item.description: 美国财政部负责经济政策的助理部长埃里克-范诺斯特兰德（Eric Van Nostrand）说，美国从未指望印度会停止进口俄罗斯石油，因为保持能源流动以防止乌克兰战争造成的任何供应冲击符合华盛顿的利益。【原文：The US never expected India to stop importing Russian oil as it’s in Washington’s interest to keep energy flowing to prevent any supply shocks caused by the Ukraine war, US Treasury Assistant Secretary for Economic Policy Eric Van Nostrand said.】

item.title: 卡齐米尔反对恢复任何特殊的欧洲央行货币政策工具
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员彼得-卡齐米尔说，他反对恢复任何 "货币政策特殊工具"。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Peter Kazimir said he opposes reviving any “special tools of monetary policy.”】

item.title: 印度尼西亚在开斋节前将高速公路上的电动汽车充电站增加了两倍
item.description: 在开斋节期间最大规模的临时人口迁移之前，印度尼西亚已将主要公路沿线的电动汽车充电站数量增加了两倍多。【原文：Indonesia has more than tripled the number of electric-vehicle charging stations along key highways ahead of its largest temporary human migration over Eid.】

item.title: 英国央行称英国企业预计两年半来涨价幅度最小
item.description: 英国公司预计将以近 2 年半以来最低的幅度提高自己的价格，这进一步表明通胀压力的缓解势头正在增强。【原文：UK companies expect to raise their own prices by the least in almost 2 1/2 years, a further sign that an unwinding of inflationary pressures is gathering momentum.】
